variable.name: clinic
variable.description: A1. Identifying information. De-identified EDIC clinic number

variable.name: form
variable.description: EDIC form number

variable.name: fsasdate
variable.description: A4. Identifying information. De-identified date form completed

variable.name: idb1adat
variable.description: B1a. Recognition event. De-identified date of occurrence

variable.name: idb1b
variable.description: B1b. Recognition event: check here if date uncertain

variable.name: idb2dat
variable.description: B2. Recognition event. De-identified date clinic learned of the event

variable.name: idb3
variable.description: B3. Recognition event. How did clinic learn of the event
variable.value: Annual medical history and physical exam
Clinic recognized event and informed patient

variable.name: idc1a
variable.description: C1a. Nature of event. Was the patient treated by: psychiatric social worker

variable.name: idc1b
variable.description: C1b. Nature of event. Was the patient treated by: psychologist

variable.name: idc1c
variable.description: C1c. Nature of event. Was the patient treated by: psychiatrist

variable.name: idc1d
variable.description: C1d. Nature of event. Was the patient treated by: other

variable.name: idc1doth
variable.description: C1d. Nature of event. Was the patient treated by: specify:

variable.name: idc2
variable.description: C2. Nature of event. Patient received outpatient treatment

variable.name: idc2a
variable.description: C2a. Nature of event. Patient received outpatient treatment in emergency room

variable.name: idc2b
variable.description: C2b. Nature of event. Patient received outpatient treatment in office

variable.name: idc2c
variable.description: C2c. Nature of event. Medical/surgical inpatient primary medical problem

variable.name: idc2d
variable.description: C2d. Nature of event. Outpatient treatment, other

variable.name: idc2doth
variable.description: C2d. Nature of event. Patient received outpatient treatment: specify

variable.name: idc3
variable.description: C3. Nature of event. Patient received in-patient treatment

variable.name: idc4
variable.description: C4. Nature of event. Using criteria in Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders

variable.name: idcdiagn
variable.description: C4. Nature of event. Specify the diagnosis

variable.name: mask_pat
variable.description: A2. Identifying information. De-identified patient ID
